## Description {#details}

A recipe for widening Call instructions using library calls.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### Variant {#a157472c9720595f1800131e69e6d2d0a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Function&#42; llvm::VPWidenCallRecipe::Variant</>}>
Variant stores a pointer to the chosen function.

There is a 1:1 mapping between a given VF and the chosen vectorized variant, so there will be a different <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> for each VF with a valid variant.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h/#l01729">1729</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
